name: drying_startCourse
description: This function is used to start a specific dryer course.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start the course.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to start the course.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to start for the dryer.

parameters.name: predefinedMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to start for the dryer.
